018package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rest.model;
019
020import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonInclude;
021import java.io.IOException;
022import java.io.Serializable;
023import java.util.ArrayList;
024import java.util.Arrays;
025import java.util.Base64;
026import java.util.List;
027import java.util.Map;
028import java.util.NavigableSet;
029import java.util.Objects;
030import javax.xml.bind.annotation.XmlAttribute;
031import javax.xml.bind.annotation.XmlElement;
032import javax.xml.bind.annotation.XmlRootElement;
033import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.CompareOperator;
034import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HConstants;
035import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Scan;
036import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.BinaryComparator;
037import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.BinaryPrefixComparator;
038import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.BitComparator;
039import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.ByteArrayComparable;
040import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.ColumnCountGetFilter;
041import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.ColumnPaginationFilter;
042import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.ColumnPrefixFilter;
043import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.ColumnRangeFilter;
044import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.CompareFilter;
045import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.DependentColumnFilter;
046import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.FamilyFilter;
047import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.Filter;
048import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.FilterList;
049import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.FirstKeyOnlyFilter;
050import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.InclusiveStopFilter;
051import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.KeyOnlyFilter;
052import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.MultiRowRangeFilter;
053import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.MultiRowRangeFilter.RowRange;
054import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.MultipleColumnPrefixFilter;
055import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.NullComparator;
056import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.PageFilter;
057import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.PrefixFilter;
058import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.QualifierFilter;
059import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.RandomRowFilter;
060import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.RegexStringComparator;
061import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.RowFilter;
062import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.SingleColumnValueExcludeFilter;
063import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.SingleColumnValueFilter;
064import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.SkipFilter;
065import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.SubstringComparator;
066import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.TimestampsFilter;
067import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.ValueFilter;
068import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.WhileMatchFilter;
069import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rest.ProtobufMessageHandler;
070import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rest.RestUtil;
071import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.visibility.Authorizations;
072import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.Bytes;
073import org.apache.yetus.audience.InterfaceAudience;
074
075import org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.com.fasterxml.jackson.jaxrs.json.JacksonJaxbJsonProvider;
076import org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.com.google.protobuf.ByteString;
077import org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.com.google.protobuf.CodedInputStream;
078import org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.com.google.protobuf.Message;
079import org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.com.google.protobuf.UnsafeByteOperations;
080import org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
081
082import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.rest.protobuf.generated.ScannerMessage.Scanner;

084/**
085 * A representation of Scanner parameters.
086 *
087 * <pre>
088 * &lt;complexType name="Scanner"&gt;
089 *   &lt;sequence&gt;
090 *     &lt;element name="column" type="base64Binary" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/&gt;
091 *     &lt;element name="filter" type="string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"&gt;&lt;/element&gt;
092 *   &lt;/sequence&gt;
093 *   &lt;attribute name="startRow" type="base64Binary"&gt;&lt;/attribute&gt;
094 *   &lt;attribute name="endRow" type="base64Binary"&gt;&lt;/attribute&gt;
095 *   &lt;attribute name="batch" type="int"&gt;&lt;/attribute&gt;
096 *   &lt;attribute name="caching" type="int"&gt;&lt;/attribute&gt;
097 *   &lt;attribute name="startTime" type="int"&gt;&lt;/attribute&gt;
098 *   &lt;attribute name="endTime" type="int"&gt;&lt;/attribute&gt;
099 *   &lt;attribute name="maxVersions" type="int"&gt;&lt;/attribute&gt;
100 * &lt;/complexType&gt;
101 * </pre>
102 */
103@XmlRootElement(name = "Scanner")
104@JsonInclude(JsonInclude.Include.NON_NULL)
105@InterfaceAudience.Private
106public class ScannerModel implements ProtobufMessageHandler, Serializable {
107
108  private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
109
110  private byte[] startRow = HConstants.EMPTY_START_ROW;
111  private byte[] endRow = HConstants.EMPTY_END_ROW;
112  private List<byte[]> columns = new ArrayList<>();
113  private int batch = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
114  private long startTime = 0;
115  private long endTime = Long.MAX_VALUE;
116  private String filter = null;
117  private int maxVersions = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
118  private int caching = -1;
119  private List<String> labels = new ArrayList<>();
120  private boolean cacheBlocks = true;
121  private int limit = -1;
122
123  /**
124   * Implement lazily-instantiated singleton as per recipe here:
125   * http://literatejava.com/jvm/fastest-threadsafe-singleton-jvm/
126   */
127  private static class JaxbJsonProviderHolder {
128    static final JacksonJaxbJsonProvider INSTANCE = new JacksonJaxbJsonProvider();
129  }
130
131  @XmlRootElement
132  static class FilterModel {
133
134    @XmlRootElement
135    static class ByteArrayComparableModel {
136      @XmlAttribute
137      public String type;
138      @XmlAttribute
139      public String value;
140      @XmlAttribute
141      public String op;
142
143      static enum ComparatorType {
144        BinaryComparator,
145        BinaryPrefixComparator,
146        BitComparator,
147        NullComparator,
148        RegexStringComparator,
149        SubstringComparator
150      }
151
152      public ByteArrayComparableModel() {
153      }
154
155      public ByteArrayComparableModel(ByteArrayComparable comparator) {
156        String typeName = comparator.getClass().getSimpleName();
157        ComparatorType type = ComparatorType.valueOf(typeName);
158        this.type = typeName;
159        switch (type) {
160          case BinaryComparator:
161          case BinaryPrefixComparator:
162            this.value = Bytes.toString(Base64.getEncoder().encode(comparator.getValue()));
163            break;
164          case BitComparator:
165            this.value = Bytes.toString(Base64.getEncoder().encode(comparator.getValue()));
166            this.op = ((BitComparator) comparator).getOperator().toString();
167            break;
168          case NullComparator:
169            break;
170          case RegexStringComparator:
171          case SubstringComparator:
172            this.value = Bytes.toString(comparator.getValue());
173            break;
174          default:
175            throw new RuntimeException("unhandled filter type: " + type);
176        }
177      }
178
179      public ByteArrayComparable build() {
180        ByteArrayComparable comparator;
181        switch (ComparatorType.valueOf(type)) {
182          case BinaryComparator:
183            comparator = new BinaryComparator(Base64.getDecoder().decode(value));
184            break;
185          case BinaryPrefixComparator:
186            comparator = new BinaryPrefixComparator(Base64.getDecoder().decode(value));
187            break;
188          case BitComparator:
189            comparator = new BitComparator(Base64.getDecoder().decode(value),
190              BitComparator.BitwiseOp.valueOf(op));
191            break;
192          case NullComparator:
193            comparator = new NullComparator();
194            break;
195          case RegexStringComparator:
196            comparator = new RegexStringComparator(value);
197            break;
198          case SubstringComparator:
199            comparator = new SubstringComparator(value);
200            break;
201          default:
202            throw new RuntimeException("unhandled comparator type: " + type);
203        }
204        return comparator;
205      }
206
207    }
208
209    /**
210     * This DTO omits the pseudo-getters in MultiRowRangeFilter.RowRange which break Jackson
211     * deserialization. It also avoids adding those as dummy JSON elements.
212     */
213    static class RowRangeModel {
214
215      protected byte[] startRow;
216
217      protected boolean startRowInclusive = true;
218
219      protected byte[] stopRow;
220
221      protected boolean stopRowInclusive = false;
222
223      public RowRangeModel() {
224      }
225
226      public RowRangeModel(MultiRowRangeFilter.RowRange rr) {
227        this.startRow = rr.getStartRow();
228        this.startRowInclusive = rr.isStartRowInclusive();
229        this.stopRow = rr.getStopRow();
230        this.stopRowInclusive = rr.isStopRowInclusive();
231      }
232
233      public MultiRowRangeFilter.RowRange build() {
234        return new MultiRowRangeFilter.RowRange(startRow, startRowInclusive, stopRow,
235          stopRowInclusive);
236      }
237
238      public byte[] getStartRow() {
239        return startRow;
240      }
241
242      public byte[] getStopRow() {
243        return stopRow;
244      }
245
246      /** Returns if start row is inclusive. */
247      public boolean isStartRowInclusive() {
248        return startRowInclusive;
249      }
250
251      /** Returns if stop row is inclusive. */
252      public boolean isStopRowInclusive() {
253        return stopRowInclusive;
254      }
255
256      @Override
257      public int hashCode() {
258        final int prime = 31;
259        int result = 1;
260        result = prime * result + Arrays.hashCode(startRow);
261        result = prime * result + Arrays.hashCode(stopRow);
262        result = prime * result + Objects.hash(startRowInclusive, stopRowInclusive);
263        return result;
264      }
265
266      @Override
267      public boolean equals(Object obj) {
268        if (this == obj) {
269          return true;
270        }
271        if (!(obj instanceof RowRangeModel)) {
272          return false;
273        }
274        RowRangeModel other = (RowRangeModel) obj;
275        return Arrays.equals(startRow, other.startRow)
276          && startRowInclusive == other.startRowInclusive && Arrays.equals(stopRow, other.stopRow)
277          && stopRowInclusive == other.stopRowInclusive;
278      }
279
280    }
281
282    // A grab bag of fields, would have been a union if this were C.
283    // These are null by default and will only be serialized if set (non null).
284    @XmlAttribute
285    public String type;
286    @XmlAttribute
287    public String op;
288    @XmlElement
289    ByteArrayComparableModel comparator;
290    @XmlAttribute
291    public String value;
292    @XmlElement
293    public List<FilterModel> filters;
294    @XmlAttribute
295    public Integer limit;
296    @XmlAttribute
297    public Integer offset;
298    @XmlAttribute
299    public String family;
300    @XmlAttribute
301    public String qualifier;
302    @XmlAttribute
303    public Boolean ifMissing;
304    @XmlAttribute
305    public Boolean latestVersion;
306    @XmlAttribute
307    public String minColumn;
308    @XmlAttribute
309    public Boolean minColumnInclusive;
310    @XmlAttribute
311    public String maxColumn;
312    @XmlAttribute
313    public Boolean maxColumnInclusive;
314    @XmlAttribute
315    public Boolean dropDependentColumn;
316    @XmlAttribute
317    public Float chance;
318    @XmlElement
319    public List<String> prefixes;
320    @XmlElement
321    private List<RowRangeModel> ranges;
322    @XmlElement
323    public List<Long> timestamps;
324
325    static enum FilterType {
326      ColumnCountGetFilter,
327      ColumnPaginationFilter,
328      ColumnPrefixFilter,
329      ColumnRangeFilter,
330      DependentColumnFilter,
331      FamilyFilter,
332      FilterList,
333      FirstKeyOnlyFilter,
334      InclusiveStopFilter,
335      KeyOnlyFilter,
336      MultipleColumnPrefixFilter,
337      MultiRowRangeFilter,
338      PageFilter,
339      PrefixFilter,
340      QualifierFilter,
341      RandomRowFilter,
342      RowFilter,
343      SingleColumnValueExcludeFilter,
344      SingleColumnValueFilter,
345      SkipFilter,
346      TimestampsFilter,
347      ValueFilter,
348      WhileMatchFilter
349    }
350
351    public FilterModel() {
352    }
353
354    public FilterModel(Filter filter) {
355      String typeName = filter.getClass().getSimpleName();
356      FilterType type = FilterType.valueOf(typeName);
357      this.type = typeName;
358      switch (type) {
359        case ColumnCountGetFilter:
360          this.limit = ((ColumnCountGetFilter) filter).getLimit();
361          break;
362        case ColumnPaginationFilter:
363          this.limit = ((ColumnPaginationFilter) filter).getLimit();
364          this.offset = ((ColumnPaginationFilter) filter).getOffset();
365          break;
366        case ColumnPrefixFilter:
367          byte[] src = ((ColumnPrefixFilter) filter).getPrefix();
368          this.value = Bytes.toString(Base64.getEncoder().encode(src));
369          break;
370        case ColumnRangeFilter:
371          ColumnRangeFilter crf = (ColumnRangeFilter) filter;
372          this.minColumn = Bytes.toString(Base64.getEncoder().encode(crf.getMinColumn()));
373          this.minColumnInclusive = crf.getMinColumnInclusive();
374          this.maxColumn = Bytes.toString(Base64.getEncoder().encode(crf.getMaxColumn()));
375          this.maxColumnInclusive = crf.getMaxColumnInclusive();
376          break;
377        case DependentColumnFilter: {
378          DependentColumnFilter dcf = (DependentColumnFilter) filter;
379          this.family = Bytes.toString(Base64.getEncoder().encode(dcf.getFamily()));
380          byte[] qualifier = dcf.getQualifier();
381          if (qualifier != null) {
382            this.qualifier = Bytes.toString(Base64.getEncoder().encode(qualifier));
383          }
384          this.op = dcf.getCompareOperator().toString();
385          this.comparator = new ByteArrayComparableModel(dcf.getComparator());
386          this.dropDependentColumn = dcf.dropDependentColumn();
387        }
388          break;
389        case FilterList:
390          this.op = ((FilterList) filter).getOperator().toString();
391          this.filters = new ArrayList<>();
392          for (Filter child : ((FilterList) filter).getFilters()) {
393            this.filters.add(new FilterModel(child));
394          }
395          break;
396        case FirstKeyOnlyFilter:
397        case KeyOnlyFilter:
398          break;
399        case InclusiveStopFilter:
400          this.value = Bytes
401            .toString(Base64.getEncoder().encode(((InclusiveStopFilter) filter).getStopRowKey()));
402          break;
403        case MultipleColumnPrefixFilter:
404          this.prefixes = new ArrayList<>();
405          for (byte[] prefix : ((MultipleColumnPrefixFilter) filter).getPrefix()) {
406            this.prefixes.add(Bytes.toString(Base64.getEncoder().encode(prefix)));
407          }
408          break;
409        case MultiRowRangeFilter:
410          this.ranges = new ArrayList<>();
411          for (RowRange range : ((MultiRowRangeFilter) filter).getRowRanges()) {
412            this.ranges.add(new RowRangeModel(range));
413          }
414          break;
415        case PageFilter:
416          this.value = Long.toString(((PageFilter) filter).getPageSize());
417          break;
418        case PrefixFilter:
419          this.value =
420            Bytes.toString(Base64.getEncoder().encode(((PrefixFilter) filter).getPrefix()));
421          break;
422        case FamilyFilter:
423        case QualifierFilter:
424        case RowFilter:
425        case ValueFilter:
426          this.op = ((CompareFilter) filter).getCompareOperator().toString();
427          this.comparator = new ByteArrayComparableModel(((CompareFilter) filter).getComparator());
428          break;
429        case RandomRowFilter:
430          this.chance = ((RandomRowFilter) filter).getChance();
431          break;
432        case SingleColumnValueExcludeFilter:
433        case SingleColumnValueFilter: {
434          SingleColumnValueFilter scvf = (SingleColumnValueFilter) filter;
435          this.family = Bytes.toString(Base64.getEncoder().encode(scvf.getFamily()));
436          byte[] qualifier = scvf.getQualifier();
437          if (qualifier != null) {
438            this.qualifier = Bytes.toString(Base64.getEncoder().encode(qualifier));
439          }
440          this.op = scvf.getCompareOperator().toString();
441          this.comparator = new ByteArrayComparableModel(scvf.getComparator());
442          if (scvf.getFilterIfMissing()) {
443            this.ifMissing = true;
444          }
445          if (scvf.getLatestVersionOnly()) {
446            this.latestVersion = true;
447          }
448        }
449          break;
450        case SkipFilter:
451          this.filters = new ArrayList<>();
452          this.filters.add(new FilterModel(((SkipFilter) filter).getFilter()));
453          break;
454        case TimestampsFilter:
455          this.timestamps = ((TimestampsFilter) filter).getTimestamps();
456          break;
457        case WhileMatchFilter:
458          this.filters = new ArrayList<>();
459          this.filters.add(new FilterModel(((WhileMatchFilter) filter).getFilter()));
460          break;
461        default:
462          throw new RuntimeException("unhandled filter type " + type);
463      }
464    }
465
466    public Filter build() {
467      Filter filter;
468      switch (FilterType.valueOf(type)) {
469        case ColumnCountGetFilter:
470          filter = new ColumnCountGetFilter(limit);
471          break;
472        case ColumnPaginationFilter:
473          filter = new ColumnPaginationFilter(limit, offset);
474          break;
475        case ColumnPrefixFilter:
476          filter = new ColumnPrefixFilter(Base64.getDecoder().decode(value));
477          break;
478        case ColumnRangeFilter:
479          filter = new ColumnRangeFilter(Base64.getDecoder().decode(minColumn), minColumnInclusive,
480            Base64.getDecoder().decode(maxColumn), maxColumnInclusive);
481          break;
482        case DependentColumnFilter:
483          filter = new DependentColumnFilter(Base64.getDecoder().decode(family),
484            qualifier != null ? Base64.getDecoder().decode(qualifier) : null, dropDependentColumn,
485            CompareOperator.valueOf(op), comparator.build());
486          break;
487        case FamilyFilter:
488          filter = new FamilyFilter(CompareOperator.valueOf(op), comparator.build());
489          break;
490        case FilterList: {
491          List<Filter> list = new ArrayList<>(filters.size());
492          for (FilterModel model : filters) {
493            list.add(model.build());
494          }
495          filter = new FilterList(FilterList.Operator.valueOf(op), list);
496        }
497          break;
498        case FirstKeyOnlyFilter:
499          filter = new FirstKeyOnlyFilter();
500          break;
501        case InclusiveStopFilter:
502          filter = new InclusiveStopFilter(Base64.getDecoder().decode(value));
503          break;
504        case KeyOnlyFilter:
505          filter = new KeyOnlyFilter();
506          break;
507        case MultipleColumnPrefixFilter: {
508          byte[][] values = new byte[prefixes.size()][];
509          for (int i = 0; i < prefixes.size(); i++) {
510            values[i] = Base64.getDecoder().decode(prefixes.get(i));
511          }
512          filter = new MultipleColumnPrefixFilter(values);
513        }
514          break;
515        case MultiRowRangeFilter: {
516          ArrayList<MultiRowRangeFilter.RowRange> rowRanges = new ArrayList<>(ranges.size());
517          for (RowRangeModel rangeModel : ranges) {
518            rowRanges.add(rangeModel.build());
519          }
520          filter = new MultiRowRangeFilter(rowRanges);
521        }
522          break;
523        case PageFilter:
524          filter = new PageFilter(Long.parseLong(value));
525          break;
526        case PrefixFilter:
527          filter = new PrefixFilter(Base64.getDecoder().decode(value));
528          break;
529        case QualifierFilter:
530          filter = new QualifierFilter(CompareOperator.valueOf(op), comparator.build());
531          break;
532        case RandomRowFilter:
533          filter = new RandomRowFilter(chance);
534          break;
535        case RowFilter:
536          filter = new RowFilter(CompareOperator.valueOf(op), comparator.build());
537          break;
538        case SingleColumnValueFilter:
539          filter = new SingleColumnValueFilter(Base64.getDecoder().decode(family),
540            qualifier != null ? Base64.getDecoder().decode(qualifier) : null,
541            CompareOperator.valueOf(op), comparator.build());
542          if (ifMissing != null) {
543            ((SingleColumnValueFilter) filter).setFilterIfMissing(ifMissing);
544          }
545          if (latestVersion != null) {
546            ((SingleColumnValueFilter) filter).setLatestVersionOnly(latestVersion);
547          }
548          break;
549        case SingleColumnValueExcludeFilter:
550          filter = new SingleColumnValueExcludeFilter(Base64.getDecoder().decode(family),
551            qualifier != null ? Base64.getDecoder().decode(qualifier) : null,
552            CompareOperator.valueOf(op), comparator.build());
553          if (ifMissing != null) {
554            ((SingleColumnValueExcludeFilter) filter).setFilterIfMissing(ifMissing);
555          }
556          if (latestVersion != null) {
557            ((SingleColumnValueExcludeFilter) filter).setLatestVersionOnly(latestVersion);
558          }
559          break;
560        case SkipFilter:
561          filter = new SkipFilter(filters.get(0).build());
562          break;
563        case TimestampsFilter:
564          filter = new TimestampsFilter(timestamps);
565          break;
566        case ValueFilter:
567          filter = new ValueFilter(CompareOperator.valueOf(op), comparator.build());
568          break;
569        case WhileMatchFilter:
570          filter = new WhileMatchFilter(filters.get(0).build());
571          break;
572        default:
573          throw new RuntimeException("unhandled filter type: " + type);
574      }
575      return filter;
576    }
577
578  }
579
580  /**
581   * Get the <code>JacksonJaxbJsonProvider</code> instance;
582   * @return A <code>JacksonJaxbJsonProvider</code>.
583   */
584  private static JacksonJaxbJsonProvider getJasonProvider() {
585    return JaxbJsonProviderHolder.INSTANCE;
586  }
587
588  /**
589   * @param s the JSON representation of the filter
590   * @return the filter
591   */
592  public static Filter buildFilter(String s) throws Exception {
593    FilterModel model =
594      getJasonProvider().locateMapper(FilterModel.class, MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_TYPE)
595        .readValue(s, FilterModel.class);
596    return model.build();
597  }
598
599  /**
600   * @param filter the filter
601   * @return the JSON representation of the filter
602   */
603  public static String stringifyFilter(final Filter filter) throws Exception {
604    return getJasonProvider().locateMapper(FilterModel.class, MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON_TYPE)
605      .writeValueAsString(new FilterModel(filter));
606  }
607
608  private static final byte[] COLUMN_DIVIDER = Bytes.toBytes(":");
609
610  /**
611   * @param scan the scan specification
612   */
613  public static ScannerModel fromScan(Scan scan) throws Exception {
614    ScannerModel model = new ScannerModel();
615    model.setStartRow(scan.getStartRow());
616    model.setEndRow(scan.getStopRow());
617    Map<byte[], NavigableSet<byte[]>> families = scan.getFamilyMap();
618    if (families != null) {
619      for (Map.Entry<byte[], NavigableSet<byte[]>> entry : families.entrySet()) {
620        if (entry.getValue() != null) {
621          for (byte[] qualifier : entry.getValue()) {
622            model.addColumn(Bytes.add(entry.getKey(), COLUMN_DIVIDER, qualifier));
623          }
624        } else {
625          model.addColumn(entry.getKey());
626        }
627      }
628    }
629    model.setStartTime(scan.getTimeRange().getMin());
630    model.setEndTime(scan.getTimeRange().getMax());
631    int caching = scan.getCaching();
632    if (caching > 0) {
633      model.setCaching(caching);
634    }
635    int batch = scan.getBatch();
636    if (batch > 0) {
637      model.setBatch(batch);
638    }
639    int maxVersions = scan.getMaxVersions();
640    if (maxVersions > 0) {
641      model.setMaxVersions(maxVersions);
642    }
643    if (scan.getLimit() > 0) {
644      model.setLimit(scan.getLimit());
645    }
646    Filter filter = scan.getFilter();
647    if (filter != null) {
648      model.setFilter(stringifyFilter(filter));
649    }
650    // Add the visbility labels if found in the attributes
651    Authorizations authorizations = scan.getAuthorizations();
652    if (authorizations != null) {
653      List<String> labels = authorizations.getLabels();
654      for (String label : labels) {
655        model.addLabel(label);
656      }
657    }
658    return model;
659  }
660
661  /**
662   * Default constructor
663   */
664  public ScannerModel() {
665  }
666
667  /**
668   * Constructor
669   * @param startRow    the start key of the row-range
670   * @param endRow      the end key of the row-range
671   * @param columns     the columns to scan
672   * @param batch       the number of values to return in batch
673   * @param caching     the number of rows that the scanner will fetch at once
674   * @param endTime     the upper bound on timestamps of values of interest
675   * @param maxVersions the maximum number of versions to return
676   * @param filter      a filter specification (values with timestamps later than this are excluded)
677   */
678  public ScannerModel(byte[] startRow, byte[] endRow, List<byte[]> columns, int batch, int caching,
679    long endTime, int maxVersions, String filter) {
680    super();
681    this.startRow = startRow;
682    this.endRow = endRow;
683    this.columns = columns;
684    this.batch = batch;
685    this.caching = caching;
686    this.endTime = endTime;
687    this.maxVersions = maxVersions;
688    this.filter = filter;
689  }
690
691  /**
692   * Constructor
693   * @param startRow  the start key of the row-range
694   * @param endRow    the end key of the row-range
695   * @param columns   the columns to scan
696   * @param batch     the number of values to return in batch
697   * @param caching   the number of rows that the scanner will fetch at once
698   * @param startTime the lower bound on timestamps of values of interest (values with timestamps
699   *                  earlier than this are excluded)
700   * @param endTime   the upper bound on timestamps of values of interest (values with timestamps
701   *                  later than this are excluded)
702   * @param filter    a filter specification
703   */
704  public ScannerModel(byte[] startRow, byte[] endRow, List<byte[]> columns, int batch, int caching,
705    long startTime, long endTime, String filter) {
706    super();
707    this.startRow = startRow;
708    this.endRow = endRow;
709    this.columns = columns;
710    this.batch = batch;
711    this.caching = caching;
712    this.startTime = startTime;
713    this.endTime = endTime;
714    this.filter = filter;
715  }
716
717  /**
718   * Add a column to the column set
719   * @param column the column name, as &lt;column&gt;(:&lt;qualifier&gt;)?
720   */
721  public void addColumn(byte[] column) {
722    columns.add(column);
723  }
724
725  /**
726   * Add a visibility label to the scan
727   */
728  public void addLabel(String label) {
729    labels.add(label);
730  }
731
732  /** Returns true if a start row was specified */
733  public boolean hasStartRow() {
734    return !Bytes.equals(startRow, HConstants.EMPTY_START_ROW);
735  }
736
737  /** Returns start row */
738  @XmlAttribute
739  public byte[] getStartRow() {
740    return startRow;
741  }
742
743  /** Returns true if an end row was specified */
744  public boolean hasEndRow() {
745    return !Bytes.equals(endRow, HConstants.EMPTY_END_ROW);
746  }
747
748  /** Returns end row */
749  @XmlAttribute
750  public byte[] getEndRow() {
751    return endRow;
752  }
753
754  /** Returns list of columns of interest in column:qualifier format, or empty for all */
755  @XmlElement(name = "column")
756  public List<byte[]> getColumns() {
757    return columns;
758  }
759
760  @XmlElement(name = "labels")
761  public List<String> getLabels() {
762    return labels;
763  }
764
765  /** Returns the number of cells to return in batch */
766  @XmlAttribute
767  public int getBatch() {
768    return batch;
769  }
770
771  /** Returns the number of rows that the scanner to fetch at once */
772  @XmlAttribute
773  public int getCaching() {
774    return caching;
775  }
776
777  /** Returns the limit specification */
778  @XmlAttribute
779  public int getLimit() {
780    return limit;
781  }
782
783  /** Returns true if HFile blocks should be cached on the servers for this scan, false otherwise */
784  @XmlAttribute
785  public boolean getCacheBlocks() {
786    return cacheBlocks;
787  }
788
789  /** Returns the lower bound on timestamps of items of interest */
790  @XmlAttribute
791  public long getStartTime() {
792    return startTime;
793  }
794
795  /** Returns the upper bound on timestamps of items of interest */
796  @XmlAttribute
797  public long getEndTime() {
798    return endTime;
799  }
800
801  /** Returns maximum number of versions to return */
802  @XmlAttribute
803  public int getMaxVersions() {
804    return maxVersions;
805  }
806
807  /** Returns the filter specification */
808  @XmlElement
809  public String getFilter() {
810    return filter;
811  }
812
813  /**
814   * @param startRow start row
815   */
816  public void setStartRow(byte[] startRow) {
817    this.startRow = startRow;
818  }
819
820  /**
821   * @param endRow end row
822   */
823  public void setEndRow(byte[] endRow) {
824    this.endRow = endRow;
825  }
826
827  /**
828   * @param columns list of columns of interest in column:qualifier format, or empty for all
829   */
830  public void setColumns(List<byte[]> columns) {
831    this.columns = columns;
832  }
833
834  /**
835   * @param batch the number of cells to return in batch
836   */
837  public void setBatch(int batch) {
838    this.batch = batch;
839  }
840
841  /**
842   * @param caching the number of rows to fetch at once
843   */
844  public void setCaching(int caching) {
845    this.caching = caching;
846  }
847
848  /**
849   * @param value true if HFile blocks should be cached on the servers for this scan, false
850   *              otherwise
851   */
852  public void setCacheBlocks(boolean value) {
853    this.cacheBlocks = value;
854  }
855
856  /**
857   * @param limit the number of rows can fetch of each scanner at lifetime
858   */
859  public void setLimit(int limit) {
860    this.limit = limit;
861  }
862
863  /**
864   * @param maxVersions maximum number of versions to return
865   */
866  public void setMaxVersions(int maxVersions) {
867    this.maxVersions = maxVersions;
868  }
869
870  /**
871   * @param startTime the lower bound on timestamps of values of interest
872   */
873  public void setStartTime(long startTime) {
874    this.startTime = startTime;
875  }
876
877  /**
878   * @param endTime the upper bound on timestamps of values of interest
879   */
880  public void setEndTime(long endTime) {
881    this.endTime = endTime;
882  }
883
884  /**
885   * @param filter the filter specification
886   */
887  public void setFilter(String filter) {
888    this.filter = filter;
889  }
890
891  @Override
892  public Message messageFromObject() {
893    Scanner.Builder builder = Scanner.newBuilder();
894    if (!Bytes.equals(startRow, HConstants.EMPTY_START_ROW)) {
895      builder.setStartRow(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(startRow));
896    }
897    if (!Bytes.equals(endRow, HConstants.EMPTY_START_ROW)) {
898      builder.setEndRow(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(endRow));
899    }
900    for (byte[] column : columns) {
901      builder.addColumns(UnsafeByteOperations.unsafeWrap(column));
902    }
903    if (startTime != 0) {
904      builder.setStartTime(startTime);
905    }
906    if (endTime != 0) {
907      builder.setEndTime(endTime);
908    }
909    builder.setBatch(getBatch());
910    if (caching > 0) {
911      builder.setCaching(caching);
912    }
913    if (limit > 0) {
914      builder.setLimit(limit);
915    }
916    builder.setMaxVersions(maxVersions);
917    if (filter != null) {
918      builder.setFilter(filter);
919    }
920    if (labels != null && labels.size() > 0) {
921      for (String label : labels)
922        builder.addLabels(label);
923    }
924    builder.setCacheBlocks(cacheBlocks);
925    return builder.build();
926  }
927
928  @Override
929  public ProtobufMessageHandler getObjectFromMessage(CodedInputStream cis) throws IOException {
930    Scanner.Builder builder = Scanner.newBuilder();
931    RestUtil.mergeFrom(builder, cis);
932    if (builder.hasStartRow()) {
933      startRow = builder.getStartRow().toByteArray();
934    }
935    if (builder.hasEndRow()) {
936      endRow = builder.getEndRow().toByteArray();
937    }
938    for (ByteString column : builder.getColumnsList()) {
939      addColumn(column.toByteArray());
940    }
941    if (builder.hasBatch()) {
942      batch = builder.getBatch();
943    }
944    if (builder.hasCaching()) {
945      caching = builder.getCaching();
946    }
947    if (builder.hasLimit()) {
948      limit = builder.getLimit();
949    }
950    if (builder.hasStartTime()) {
951      startTime = builder.getStartTime();
952    }
953    if (builder.hasEndTime()) {
954      endTime = builder.getEndTime();
955    }
956    if (builder.hasMaxVersions()) {
957      maxVersions = builder.getMaxVersions();
958    }
959    if (builder.hasFilter()) {
960      filter = builder.getFilter();
961    }
962    if (builder.getLabelsList() != null) {
963      List<String> labels = builder.getLabelsList();
964      for (String label : labels) {
965        addLabel(label);
966      }
967    }
968    if (builder.hasCacheBlocks()) {
969      this.cacheBlocks = builder.getCacheBlocks();
970    }
971    return this;
972  }
973
974}
